title: RAK12501 WisBlock GNSS Location Module > RAK12501 WisBlock GNSS Location Module > Product Description > RAK12501 WisBlock GNSS Location Module Overview
content: The RAK12501 WisBlock GNSS Location Module is designed to be part of a production-ready IoT solution in a modular way and must be combined with a WisBlock Core and a Base module.
parent_content:
The RAK12501 WisBlock GNSS Location Module is designed to be part of a production-ready IoT solution in a modular way and must be combined with a WisBlock Core and a Base module.  
Equipped with the Quectel L76K, the RAK12501 supports a wide variety of satellite data protocols such as GPS, GLONASS, QZSS, and BeiDou. This ensures the retrieval of precise location data. The module features exceptional performance, high sensitivity, and minimal acquisition time. A very suitable module for your low-power IoT solution needs.

title: RAK12501 WisBlock GNSS Location Module > RAK12501 WisBlock GNSS Location Module > Prerequisites > RAK12501 WisBlock GNSS Location Module Requirements
content:
To use the **RAK12501 WisBlock GNSS Location Module**, you need a **WisBlock Base** to provide power and a **WisBlock Core** to control the module.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the matching screws to ensure intact placement and connection.
parent_content:
To use the **RAK12501 WisBlock GNSS Location Module**, you need a **WisBlock Base** to provide power and a **WisBlock Core** to control the module.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the matching screws to ensure intact placement and connection.
